links.title: CleanSpark's Q3 FY2024 Earnings Results Webcast
CleanSpark's Q2 FY2024 Earnings Results Webcast
ICR Industry Outlook | BTC Mining: Navigating a Post-Halving World
links.content:
![](//assets.swoogo.com/uploads/medium/3380679-6581bc7ad5adf.png)

**ICR Industry Outlook | BTC Mining: Navigating a Post-Halving World**

_The link to join the Live Event will be visible here 10 minutes prior to start time. Please refresh your screen if it does not appear._

[WATCH REPLAY](/btc/presentation?i=HGvMor0oOv-mREhYR8zt9e6QPWjEVyBp)

**Wednesday, January 24, 2024 | 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM ET**

Commercial scale bitcoin mining has captured the attention of investors, both institutional and retail alike in the last few years. Just as we appear to be emerging from the “Crypto Winter” of 2022-2023, and markets appear to be regaining investor confidence, miners are faced with having to prepare for the inevitable “halving”, (a 50% reduction in BTC mining rewards earned per block), anticipated in April 2024. 

Join us as we examine the tough questions facing management teams as well as investors regarding the impact of the upcoming mining halving event. 

Topics to Include:  
---  
How are the world's largest miners preparing for the 50% reduction in mining rewards per block?  
How are they adjusting their business models to endure this expected tightening?  
The implications for the next round of capital investment into next generation ASICs  
Expectations for BTC pricing in 2024 and beyond.  
  
**SPEAKERS** - Click on name for bio 

Previous

![](//assets.swoogo.com/uploads/medium/3346934-657736b9e8b99.jpg)**[Zach Bradford](https://icr.swoogo.com/BTC/speaker/1016769/zach-bradford "Speaker Details")** CleanSparkChief Executive Officer
